subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Newcastle United was taken off the market by its owner, Mike Ashley. Ashley, who made his fortune in sportswear, put the club up for sale three months ago after saying he could no longer attend home matches because of abuse from fans.
snippet: Newcastle United was taken off the market by its owner, Mike Ashley. Ashley, who made his fortune in sportswear, put the club up for sale three months ago after saying he could no longer attend home matches because of abuse from fans.
